name: HouseMover
description:
Story:

You have just moved to your new house, and your stuff from your old house is coming in boxes. Stack as many boxes as you can inside your house, if you leave any outside for too long its game over!

Controls:

  • Left mouse button to drag-and-drop

Tutorial/Notes:

  • The game over counter dose not start before you move the first box.
  • When you are holding a box, the tile under your mouse will turn green if you can place the box on the tile. It will turn red otherwise.
  • Each successful box placed inside will give you 10 points, try to get as many points as possible.
  • The boxes is color coded based on size. Red is big box, Blue is medium box, Green is small box.
  • You can stack smaller boxes on top of bigger boxes, but not the other way around. And you can not stack boxes of same size on top of eachother.

Known bugs:

  • If you try to place a box on a tile, but your mouse is hovering over other boxes, it will not place the box where you want it, and most likely put it back where you picked it up from.

Install instructions:

Download then unzip to your computer, open the folder and run the .exe file

Tools used:

- Unity /w JetBrains Rider
- Bfxr
- Snippingtool :)
